title: That new Taliyah W is clunky.
body: I know I'm late, but jesus, wtf is that ability now? I keep tossing the enemy in the wrong direction because it doesn't work correctly.

replies.body: I feel you but Jasonwazza is right. Vector = click and drag. I still think it is a little clunkier than before but once you get used to it, its fine.
It works fine, you just have to get used to vector casting.
